notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: S.T.-S., A.A.M., and M.S. designed the study, the sample collection process and prepared the essential oils, S.T.-S. and S.M.-G. optimized and carried out the chemical analysis, S.T.-S. performed the data analysis under the supervision of S.M., S.T.-S., S.M.-G. and S.M. wrote the manuscript.
